issue.title: Setting position of model via commandline causes Gazebo to crash when using Dart.

content.raw:
Here is the backtrace:


```
#!c++

[Switching to Thread 0x7fff6a7fb700 (LWP 11928)]
0x00007ffff6bc0cc9 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6)
    at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
56	../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff6bc0cc9 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6)
    at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
#1  0x00007ffff6bc40d8 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007fffe4520972 in dDebug () from /usr/lib/libdart-core.so.4.3
#3  0x00007fffe451f9fc in _dLDLTRemove () from /usr/lib/libdart-core.so.4.3
#4  0x00007fffe4521c56 in dLCP::transfer_i_from_C_to_N(int, void*) ()
   from /usr/lib/libdart-core.so.4.3
#5  0x00007fffe4523024 in dSolveLCP(int, double*, double*, double*, double*, int, double*, double*, int*) () from /usr/lib/libdart-core.so.4.3
#6  0x00007fffe45ad11e in dart::constraint::DantzigLCPSolver::solve(dart::constraint::ConstrainedGroup*) () from /usr/lib/libdart-core.so.4.3
#7  0x00007fffe45a6d41 in dart::constraint::ConstraintSolver::solveConstrainedGroups() () from /usr/lib/libdart-core.so.4.3
#8  0x00007fffe45a888b in dart::constraint::ConstraintSolver::solve() ()
   from /usr/lib/libdart-core.so.4.3
#9  0x00007fffe45b9fb8 in dart::simulation::World::step(bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/libdart-core.so.4.3
#10 0x00007ffff06050d9 in gazebo::physics::DARTPhysics::UpdatePhysics (
    this=0x1a561c0)
    at /data/gazebo_depends_part2/gazebo/physics/dart/DARTPhysics.cc:228
#11 0x00007ffff667ed5b in gazebo::physics::World::Update (
    this=this@entry=0x19041d0)
    at /data/gazebo_depends_part2/gazebo/physics/World.cc:799
#12 0x00007ffff6689efb in gazebo::physics::World::Step (
    this=this@entry=0x19041d0)
    at /data/gazebo_depends_part2/gazebo/physics/World.cc:698
#13 0x00007ffff668a3a5 in gazebo::physics::World::RunLoop (this=0x19041d0)
    at /data/gazebo_depends_part2/gazebo/physics/World.cc:467

   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.54.0

    at pthread_create.c:312
```
